entry.title: Leon completion of their MRPM summer program

link.title: Leon completion of their MRPM summer program

entry.content: Congradulation to Leon for presenting their final research presentation on cell tracking and completing his summer MRPM program!
entry.summary: Congradulation to Leon for presenting their final research presentation on cell tracking and completing his summer MRPM program!

entry.title: David, Isabelle and Will completed their directed studies

link.title: David, Isabelle and Will completed their directed studies

entry.content: Congradulation to David, Isabelle and Will for presenting their final research presentation and completing their undergraduate directed studies!
entry.summary: Congradulation to David, Isabelle and Will for presenting their final research presentation and completing their undergraduate directed studies!

entry.title: Haley presenting at BIG 2024 conference
entry.content: Haley presented a speed talk at the annual BIG 2024 conference at UBC and was awarded second place for best speed talk!
entry.summary: Haley presented a speed talk at the annual BIG 2024 conference at UBC and was awarded second place for best speed talk!

entry.title: Hello world
entry.content: Welcome to our lab website! We’re a bioinformatic lab at UBC, studying single cell sequencing. Stay tuned for regular updates and news on our latest discoveries and activities!
entry.summary: Welcome to our lab website! We’re a bioinformatic lab at UBC, studying single cell sequencing. Stay tuned for regular updates and news on our latest discoveries and activities!
